name: PICTUREWAVE
description:
Choose a category and guess the images! How many can you get before time runs out? Stream and work together with friends to improve your chances!

Originally developed for the Super Social Distance Jam 2020

Alexia Mohabir - Designer
Dakota Hernandez - Programmer

SFX by Bertrof and kylekirkpatrick
Licence: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/legalcode

Chill Wave by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3498-chill-wave
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0

Beauty Flow by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5025-beauty-flow
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
